panels.description: Status of tasks over time
panels.title: Status of tasks

panels.description: Calculates the total rate of time spent on JVM garbage collection across all garbage collector types, over a 5-minute period.
panels.title: JVM GC time

panels.description: Calculates the average per-second CPU usage of a process over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Average number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections per  second.
panels.title: Network IO Rate

panels.description: Bytes per second read off all sockets
panels.title: Incoming Byte Rate

panels.description: Average number of outgoing bytes sent per second to all servers
panels.title: Outgoing Byte Rate

panels.description: Current number of active connections
panels.title: Current number of active connections

panels.description: Connections that failed authentication
panels.title: Failed authentication connections

panels.description: Average number of requests sent per second
panels.title: Average number of requests

panels.description: Responses received and sent per second
panels.title: Responses received and sent

panels.description: Fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O
panels.title: IO Ratio

panels.description: Tracks the average time (in milliseconds) that a Kafka Connect worker spends on rebalancing operations.
panels.title: Rebalances average time

panels.description: Time since last rebalance
panels.title: ($instance) Time since last rebalance

panels.description: Average size of the batches processed by the connector
panels.title: Batch Size Average

panels.description: Maximum size of the batches processed by the connector
panels.title: Batch Size Max

panels.description: Average percentage of the tasks offset commit attempts that succeeded
panels.title: Offset commit success percentage

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds taken by this task to commit offsets
panels.title: Offset commit Average Time

panels.description: The fraction of time this task has spent in the running state.
panels.title: Running ratio

panels.description: The average percentage of this task's offset commit attempts that failed.
panels.title: Offset Commit Failure Percentage

panels.description: Total number of failures seen by task
panels.title: Total record failures

panels.description: Total number of errors seen by task
panels.title: Total record errors

panels.description: Total number of records skipped by task
panels.title: Total record skipped

panels.description: Total number of retries made by task
panels.title: Total retries

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds taken by this task to poll for a batch of source records
panels.title: Poll Batch Average time

panels.description: The maximum time in milliseconds taken by this task to poll for a batch of source records
panels.title: Poll Batch Max time

panels.description: The average per-second number of records produced/polled (before transformation) by this task belonging to the named source connector in this worker.
panels.title: Source Record Poll rate

panels.description: The average per-second number of records output from the transformations and written to Kafka for this task belonging to the named source connector in this worker. This is after transformations are applied and excludes any records filtered out by the transformations.
panels.title: Source Record Write rate

panels.description: The average number of records that have been produced by this task but not yet completely written to Kafka.
panels.title: Source Record Active Count average

panels.description: The maximum number of records that have been produced by this task but not yet completely written to Kafka.
panels.title: Source Record Active Count max

panels.description: The number of records output written to Kafka for this task belonging to the named source connector in this worker, since the task was last restarted. This is after transformations are applied, and excludes any records filtered out by the transformations.
panels.title: Source Record Write Count

panels.description: The total number of records produced/polled (before transformation) by this task belonging to the named source connector in this worker.
panels.title: Source Record Poll Count

panels.description: The number of requests sent per second.
panels.title: Producer Request Sent Rate

panels.description: The average size of requests sent.
panels.title: Producer Request Size Average

panels.description: The number of responses received per second
panels.title: Producer Response Received Rate

panels.description: Measures the average round-trip time, in milliseconds, for a batch of records sent from the Source connector to the Kafka broker.
panels.title: Producer Request Latency Average

panels.description: The number of topic partitions assigned to this task belonging to the named sink
panels.title: Partition Count

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds taken by this task to put a batch of sinks records
panels.title: Put Batch Average time

panels.description: The maximum time in milliseconds taken by this task to put a batch of sinks
panels.title: Put Batch Max time

panels.description: The total number of records read from Kafka by this task belonging to the named sink connector in this worker, since the task was last restarted
panels.title: Sink Record Read Count

panels.description: The number of records that have been read from Kafka but not yet completely committed/flushed/acknowledged by the sink task.
panels.title: Sink Record Active Count

panels.description: The average number of records that have been read from Kafka but not yet completely committed/flushed/acknowledged by the sink task.
panels.title: Sink Record Active Count Average

panels.description: The maximum number of records that have been read from Kafka but not yet completely committed/flushed/acknowledged by the sink task.
panels.title: Sink Record Active Max Count

panels.description: The average per-second number of records read from Kafka for this task belonging to the named sink connector in this worker. This is before transformations are applied.
panels.title: Sink Record Read Rate

panels.description: The total number of records output from the transformations and sent/put to this task belonging to the named sink connector in this worker, since the task was last restarted.
panels.title: Sink Record Send Total

panels.description: The average per-second number of records output from the transformations and sent/put to this task belonging to the named sink connector in this worker. This is after transformations are applied and excludes any records filtered out by the transformations.
panels.title: Sink Record Send Rate

panels.description: The total number of offset commit completions that were completed successfully.
panels.title: Number of Offset Commit Completions

panels.description: The average per-second number of offset commit completions that were completed successfully.
panels.title: Offset Commit Completion Rate

panels.description: The number of requests sent per second
panels.title: Consumer Request Sent Rate

panels.description: The average size of requests sent
panels.title: Consumer Request Size Average

panels.description: The number of responses received per second
panels.title: Consumer Response Rate

panels.description: Represents the average time, in milliseconds, taken by the Kafka consumer within the sink connector to fetch a batch of records from a Kafka topic partition.
panels.title: Consumer Fetch Latency Average

panels.description: Measures the number of fetches per second for the sink connector to asks the Kafka brokers for new batches of records to process.
panels.title: Consumer Fetch Rate
